# Description
This RProject is social network analytics in a microservices architecture. The objective of this research is to identify, among a variety of metrics, those capable of explaining the observed criticality behavior of each service in the architecture diagrams.

# Files execution order
Packages.R
Functions.R
Analysis.R
Plots.R
